properties.name: camel.dataformat.protobuf.content-type-format
properties.description: Defines a content type format in which protobuf message will be serialized/deserialized from(to) the Java been. The format can either be native or json for either native protobuf or json fields representation. The default value is native.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.protobuf.content-type-header
properties.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSON

properties.name: camel.dataformat.protobuf.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the protobuf data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.protobuf.instance-class
properties.description: Name of class to use when unmarshalling
